text: Anthony Wayne "Bubba" Green (September 30, 1957 â€“ June 21, 2019) was an American football player. He played as a defensive lineman. He played one season for the Baltimore Colts in the National Football League (NFL) in 1981. After playing 15 games for the Colts, he injured his knee and never played another NFL game. Green was born in Cape May, New Jersey and grew up in Woodbine. Green died of cancer on June 21, 2019 in Randallstown, Maryland. He was 62. ==References== ==Other websites== *Bubba Green at Pro-Football- Reference.com Category:1957 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American football players Category:Baltimore Colts players Category:Cancer deaths in Maryland Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey
title: Bubba Green
